eventName: Come Catastrophes or Wakes of Vultures
storyInfo: Liskarm's squad refuses to carry out the bank's orders to use force, and chooses to stand on the side of the people. Meanwhile, Jessica is deeply disappointed by 'Clip' Cliff's indifference towards the locals.

attributes.content: The vast lands of the frontier still have considerable potential for development, and we earnestly invite everyone whose talents have not yet been put to their best use to join us out there.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: But for those who remain steadfastly committed to their hometowns, we've also been preparing a plate redevelopment plan.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: And what is this plan, exactly?
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: For certain plates that have not been meeting industrial benchmarks, we've thought up redevelopment plans to give them a brand new image. The high-tech industries attracted by the state government will make use of these valuable plates to expand their cutting-edge businesses.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: What exciting news! I'm sure all the residents of those plates can't wait to see the bright new future that awaits them.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: We already have concrete plans for a number of them, including Bayswood, Deadhorse, and Davistown.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: I wonder if anyone in the audience is tuning in from any of those plates? I'm sure it'll be the best news they've heard all year, haha!
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Mr. Cliff, you wouldn't believe how excited I am to see the splendor of Fort Barron with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: You're too kind. It's our honor to work with a company like yours.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Hahaha! If at all possible, I would like to continue our partnership across other business ventures, out in the frontier.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: I was just thinking the same thing.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: It's always a pleasure to speak with you, and I hope that never changes. After all, towing is a long process, and we might not be parting ways until the snow melts in the spring.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: Too soon, if you ask me. A true pityâ€”
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Sir! Sir!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Please, let me in! I have something urgent to report!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: If you ever need anything, my door is always openâ€”
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Please open the door, sir! It's an emergency! I'm begging you!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...Sounds like you have urgent matters to attend to?
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: Give me just a minute.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: What are you doing here, Jessica? Who gave you permission to come yelling and banging on my door?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: My apologies, sir, but the contents of Jessica's report are, in fact, urgent.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Out with it then.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: That man over there...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: May I use your restroom?
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Now, what exactly was so important that you had to come running to me?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: The bank is trying to leverage their deal with the government to make us open fire on a civilian crowd.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: And did you do it?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: I can't say what happened after I left, but...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: There's no way we'd obey that order.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Alright, I understand. You can leave now.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: What are we going to do about the residents?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's none of your business.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: But can you at leastâ€”
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: If you still don't get it, I'll spell it out for you.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: It's none of your business, and it's none of mine either.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: ...Are you serious?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Then what is your business? The massive kickback you're getting from the bank? The extrajudicial privileges that the military grants you? Or is it the feeling you get when you trample people beneath your feet?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The feeling of being superior to others?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Cliff narrows his eyes, scanning the now-unfamiliar mercenary before him from head to toe.
I'm in my nineties, Jessica. It takes more than that to get me excited.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Why, then...? What do you get from surrounding yourself with these people?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: How can I not have suspicions? The way I see it... you've thrown away almost all of your humanity, and for what?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Humanity... It's a word that means less and less to me as I get older. Blacksteel is a PMC, and I'm the boss. What do I need pretty words for?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: To put it another way, Jessica, if those are the things you value so much, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: I remember what your father once told me. That you wanted to resolve conflicts and protect others.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: That's right...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: In that case, why not become a police officer, a judge, or a peacekeeper? And if all else fails, you could at least become a soldier to protect your family and country, right?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: But you chose mercenary. A job that uses force for money. A job that's inseparable from death and violence. A job that's devoid of glory or honor.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: And I know you're not short on cash either, so I ask you again, Jessicaâ€”what are you even doing here?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: If you haven't figured it out yet, then I can always give you my answer. Because I have one.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Ambition... For the sake of my own ambitions. To prove that I'm no less than my brothers and sisters. To prove... that I am not a mediocre stain on my family.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's why I'm here.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Not bad. I like seeing that clarity and self-awareness.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: So don't stand there and criticize the way I conduct my business. Your father's also an excellent businessman, and as his daughter, you'd do well to learn from him.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: You need to be more mature, more rational. Less emotional.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Secretary, escort her out. From now on, never let her in again, no matter what.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: ...Decades ago, you sat back and watched your friends get taken captive. Decades later, you're doing the same thing as people are being driven from their homes.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: If that's what you call a mature, rational, and level-headed choice...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Then I'd rather stay naive my entire life. I'd rather remain a mediocre fool.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Please leave, Miss Brynley.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Don't touch me... I can leave on my own.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I see you've taken care of your business?
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: However, I did hear some bad news. Some very, very unfortunate news.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Your subordinates gave my people an order to open fire at the entrance of the bank.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Without asking, without permission.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: And why is that a problem?
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: We have authorization from the government, and you provided us that team. When an urgent situation arises that requires force, I don't see why it's necessary to report our every move to you, line by line.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: You can rest assured that our people will show restraint. But during emergencies, our own needs must come first.
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: I don't think you understand what I'm saying.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: This is very bad news, but not for me. For you.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: S-Surely you jest...
attributes.name: Bank President

attributes.content: Nobody can go over my head and command my troops. If you really want us to coexist in harmony going forward, you'd best remember those words.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Have you finished sorting that batch of documents?
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: I'm going through them right now... I- I'll have them ready shortly.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Um... I just saw a repossession document. Leone Theremin just recently sold his shares...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: But this blank contract prepared for him showed up in a pile of documents dating back more than a decade.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: And it's not just this one document. Many of them have been misplaced... and don't have any signatures on them.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: They weren't misplaced. They were prepared in advance.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: But, ten years ago... Many of these people hadn't even set foot in the bank yet.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Sylvia, we have a professional actuarial system. Our concern has never been collecting a bit of interest on the loans.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: We've always had our eyes on the prize, and that's never changed: everything here.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Th-That isn't what you told me before...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: True. You aren't part of the inner circle, so it's understandable that you'd be out of the loop. All the more reason to work harder and rise through the ranks.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: But given the current situation... I think you'd best make full use of the opportunity you have before you.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Woody, where did you go?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: What happened to your arm?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Pushed my luck a little... and they finally put me in my place.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Helena, if... if I were to leave this town, would you come with me?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: ...What'd that guy say to you?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Nothing... Just proved once and for all that he's still a good-for-nothing bastard.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: But that good-for-nothing bastard is the reason you left Laterano without a second thought, first set foot on Columbian soil, and joined a war that took nearly everything from you.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: The ideals he painted back then were so mesmerizing, so tempting... To be a hero, to lead our people to end the war, to build a new paradise, beyond Laterano.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: You know how it is for young'uns with their heads in the clouds. Always following whoever shows the most confidence when peddling their dreams.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: I know, Woody, I know... But I ain't even saying you were tricked.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I'm just saying you don't have to be ashamed of your past. It don't matter where your journey started, because it brought you here.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Those mistakes made you who you are.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Sure, you can look back every now and then, but don't you ever regret it.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Helena...
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Care for a dance, Woody? I can teach you.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: When I was eighteen, some awkward fella taught me these steps. He was a complete fool, through-and-through, but that didn't stop me from loving the dance.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Actually, I already know how to dance...
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Oh? How come I never knew that? Since when?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: ...Since I was little. And of course you didn't know. I never told you.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Where'd you learn?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: ...On my way back to the dorms.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Wanna give it a go, then?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: ...It'd be my pleasure, ma'am.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Why didn't you just walk away when you got the order to vacate them?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: When you're disobeying orders, might as well go all the way.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Tch... What a drama queen. Even the squads that showed up later could tell you were staying behind to make sure it didn't get out of hand.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: So how's your forehead doing? Didn't expect our own people to wear kiddie gloves with the crowd but show no mercy to their coworkers.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I'm fine, just a scratch.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: And at the end of the day, we were the first to disobey orders... I didn't know what to do at that point either, so I just went back to the basics. Made sure that nobody got hurt.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Well, you did a damn good job, Teacher's Pet.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: By the way, there's something I've been meaning to tell you all day, but never got the chance...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Happy New Year.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Let me check... Sorry, but it's already past midnight.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Eh, so what?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I suppose it's not important. Maybe it just sucks that... I wasn't the one to say it first.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Happy New Year.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: The heavy iron door shuts tightly, and the mechanism springs into place with the sound of a dull collision, sealing off the smell of ink coming from within.
An intoxicating smell.
With just one whiff, people will start having wondrous delusions. All their desires can be at their fingertips, and all their regrets can be made right.
What... do you really want?
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: And what... do you regret?
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: ...Sylvia.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Top of your class again? ...Golly, how did someone like me give birth to a kid as smart as you? I couldn't be more proud of you, Sylvie.
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: Are you serious, Sylvie? That's the best financial institution in all of Columbia... Goodness gracious, I can't believe my daughter actually made it! I'm so, so proud of you, I really can't say it enough!
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: Sylvie, are you sure you want to work in a bank back home? You know... I don't want my position to get in the way of what you want, especially with a decision as important as this one.
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: ...I'm so proud of you, my daughter.
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... *cough* *cough*... Go, Sylvie. You can always find another job... I... I'll be fine...
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: No matter... No matter what you do... Your mom... will always be proud of you.
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: Even... when I'm no longer here...
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: You're my pride and joy... forever and always...
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: Mom...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: I.... I hope... you'll always be proud of me.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: It is a magical smell that can even twist the threads of time.
Within it, a tiny infant picks up a kite that will not take flight for decades, and a sickly old man sees the honeyed candy he longed for when he was three.
Nobody can resist its temptation.
